name: Pub Crawl (BMo)
description:
Keep your buzz alive!

In this game you are sent out to a pub that is overrun with monstrous insects. Help out the barkeep by clearing out the bugs, and also keeping your tab active.

The more you consume, the more difficult it becomes to see your surroundings and keep your aim straight.

WIN  by clearing out the insect nests and killing the Queen. But be warned, shes not known to make an appearance. It may take a while, and more than a few drinks. 

LOSE by sobering up! You'll constantly be sobering up the longer you take, and being swarmed by the attacking bugs will speed up the process.

ONE bartender to keep you company.

THREE different Weapons to exterminate the insect menace.

FOUR different Enemy Types to be wary of.

EIGHT different bug-based drinks to indulge in.
